sections.title: All natural, as the earth gives it
sections.content: Only share produce grown without chemicals or pesticides.

sections.title: Clear and simple transactions
sections.content: Clearly explain what you offer and what you need in return.

sections.title: From your garden to someone else's
sections.content: Only share products/services that come from your own cultivation. No store-bought items for resale.

sections.title: Treat us with respect and sincerity
sections.content: Keep your promises, respond kindly, and communicate if any changes arise.

sections.title: Let's take care of the planet at every step
sections.content: Use reusable or compostable packaging and avoid unnecessary plastic. You can also post second-hand garden-related items that help reduce our carbon footprint.

sections.title: This is a community
sections.content: The idea is to share, exchange, gift, and sell at a fair price. Check market value if you need to propose a price.

sections.title: Sharing knowledge is also exchanging
sections.content: Feel encouraged to share tips, recipes, or growing tricks. Together we learn and grow this space.
